message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $130. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm still not willing to go as low as $110, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession and offer you the product for $125. What do you think?
I appreciate your concession, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
